moveDown(Cell[][]) - Method in class com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities.tileMovement
Method analyzes cells from bottom to top by checking their final position after the down key is pressed by calling the "passDestination" method from the tileChecker class.
moveHorizontally(Cell[][], int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities.generalMovement
Method that "moves" the tiles and is the main core for all the operations concerning horizontal movements.
moveLeft(Cell[][]) - Method in class com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities.tileMovement
Method analyzes cells from left to right by checking their final position after the left key is pressed by calling the "passDestination" method from the tileChecker class.
moveRight(Cell[][]) - Method in class com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities.tileMovement
Method analyzes cells from right to left by checking their final position after the right key is pressed by calling the "passDestination" method from the tileChecker class.
moveUp(Cell[][]) - Method in class com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities.tileMovement
Method analyzes cells from top to bottom by checking their final position after the up key is pressed by calling the "passDestination" method from the tileChecker class.
moveVertically(Cell[][], int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities.generalMovement
Method that "moves" the tiles and is the main core for all the operations concerning vertical movements.
